title: Quote Policy for Customer with Prior Lapse
description: A potential customer is requesting a quote but had a lapse in their previous insurance coverage.

tasks.description: Gather applicant information and ask about prior insurance history.
tasks.expected_outcome: The applicant discloses a 60-day lapse in coverage within the last year.

tasks.description: Check underwriting guidelines regarding lapses in coverage.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent confirms that a lapse in coverage results in a higher premium but does not make the applicant ineligible.

tasks.description: Generate a quote that includes the surcharge for the lapse in coverage.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides an accurate quote that reflects the higher risk.
